name: My GMS - Gereja Mawar Sharon
description: This app will show you the milestones of your journey and how far you have grown before the Lord with us. You can check on the date you got baptized, the classes you have attended, your ministries activities, and even book a seat for events. Many more features are coming Your way!  Join us now! If you want to know Lord Jesus more and havent joined any local church and you want to have strong and caring small communities for support, we invite you to begin the journey here.
